scripts.check-node-version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const nvmVersion = fs.readFileSync('.nvmrc', 'utf8').trim(); const currentVersion = process.version.slice(1); console.log('Current Node version: ' + currentVersion + ', Required version: ' + nvmVersion); if (!currentVersion.startsWith(nvmVersion.split('.')[0])) { console.error('\x1b[31mERROR: Node version mismatch! Make sure to run nvm use first.\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1); }"
